 Implements RFC2898, which specifies key derivation from a password and a salt value.

Detailed Description

Performs AES encryption.

Uses a key obtained using key derivation from a password and a salt value method as described in RFC2898.

See also:
Encryption Methods: How to Best Protect Your Data

Definition at line 80 of file ZipAesCryptograph.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CZipAesCryptograph::CZipAesCryptograph ( int  iStrength  )  [inline]

Initializes a new instance of the CZipAesCryptograph class.

Parameters:
iStrength The algorithm's strength. One of the CZipCryptograph::EncryptionMethod values, that is related to AES encryption.
Exceptions:
CZipException with the CZipException::generic code, if iStrength is invalid.

Implements RFC2898, which specifies key derivation from a password and a salt value.

Parameters:
